docs.title: Commands
docs.text: There are four manuals in the NHCR technical documentation. Choose the one based on your needs: User: Start here then move on. This covers the basics, use cases, how matching works, and the user interface. Implementer: This manual covers some of the areas important to deploying NHCR. Developer: This manual covers details for building new features and customizing NHCR. Sysadmin: This manual shows how to install NHCR on servers and how to configure it.
